title: How this tiny device became a symbol for the backlash against AI
description: By Clare Duffy, CNN New York (CNN) — An unassuming circular pendant slightly larger than a quarter has been at the center of a massive uproar. The chief executive behind it isn’t fazed. title: Superintelligence is AI’s next frontier but putting humans first is the defining challenge of our time
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is hurling us into an era of machine superintelligence. The real question now is whether we can place this power at the service of humanity—or losing control of it becomes the defining risk of our future as a species.
content: Indeed, the most consequential question for our time is not whether AI will surpass us, because in some ways it already has (try beating an AI at general knowledge), in many other ways, it will, and in some ways we will always be unique. The real que... [4243 chars]

title: AI Tool In National Disease Surveillance Helped Issue Over 5,000 Alerts To Health Authorities: Data
description: An artificial intelligence tool deployed by the National Centre for Disease Control (NCDC) in 2022 may have helped issue more than 5,000 alerts of infectious outbreaks to health authorities in real-time since installation, according to a study. Developed by WadhwaniAI, a New Delhi-based healthcare AI solutions provider, the 'Health Sentinel' tool could have helped slash 98% of manual workload.
content:
